name: update-assembly-info
description: Update assembly info of one or multiple projects
helpMarkDown: Having Problems? Please [create an issue on our Github](https://github.com/BoolBySigma/UpdateAssemblyInfo/issues) and we will try to help you.
author: Bool (by Sigma)

inputs.name: assemblyInfoFiles
inputs.label: Assembly Info
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root of the assembly info file(s). Variables can be used, eg. `$(Build.SourcesDirectory)`. You can also use wildcards, eg. `\*\*\AssemblyInfo.\*` for all AssemblyInfo.* files in all sub folders.

inputs.name: ensureAttribute
inputs.label: Add Missing Attributes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Adds attribute to assembly info file if it is missing. If the attribute is not specified in this task it will not be added.

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Left blank, the value is not updated. Variables can be used.

inputs.name: configuration
inputs.label: Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Left blank, the value is not updated. Variables can be used, eg. `$(BuildConfiguration)`.

inputs.name: company
inputs.label: Company
inputs.helpMarkDown: Left blank, the value is not updated. Variables can be used.

inputs.name: product

inputs.name: customAttributes
inputs.label: Custom Attributes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Input custom attribute and value in format `AttributeName=AttributeValue`. Use a new line for each new custom attribute.</br></br>Example:</br>`AttributeName1=AttributeValue1`</br>`AttributeName2=AttributeValue2`</br>`AttributeName3=AttributeValue3`</br></br>Left blank, the value is not updated. Variables can be used.
